CustomField.formula: IF(Funnel_Scorecard_Test__c = 0, IF( Completed_Call_Planner__c =TRUE,7,0)+ IF( Min_1_ea_high_influence_UBI_TBI__c =TRUE,5,0)+ IF( EBI_id_along_decision_making_criteria__c =TRUE,9,0)+ IF( Influential_coach_who_shares_opp_insight__c =TRUE,8,0)+ IF( BI_objections_id_with_clear_resolution_s__c =TRUE,7,0)+ IF( BI_in_trouble_mode_ready_to_take_action__c =TRUE,8,0)+ IF( BI_engage_in_open_honest_communication__c =TRUE,6,0)+ IF( Identified_anti_sponsor_competition__c =TRUE,7,0)+ IF( Seller_has_id_BI_pain_pts_solution__c =TRUE,7,0)+ IF( Taught_BI_something_new_valuable__c =TRUE,6,0)+ IF( Service_relationship_trumps_lowest_price__c =TRUE,6,0)+ IF( Right_SC_team_aligned_in_opportunity__c =TRUE,4,0)+ IF( No_RFP_or_we_wrote_it_not_matching_comps__c =TRUE,8,0)+ IF( BI_understands_appreciates_our_brand__c =TRUE,5,0)+ IF( BI_understands_aligns_with_value_prop__c =TRUE,7,0), Funnel_Scorecard_Test__c )
